author: marywilliams-2015-07-31T03:18:05-0400
title: Your Travel Guide to Mexico!
text:
Travel Articles | 
Mexico, the 14th largest country in the world is famous for its Tequila, food, art, literature and its beaches and tourist attractions. Acapulco, Cancun, Cozumel, etc. are the popular cities of Mexico. There are a plenty of tourist attractions like the Xcaret, Malecon, The Arch, Avenida Revolucion etc. Cancun, known as the Paradise in Caribbean, happens to be the hub of Mexico’ 
Mexico is a country between the U.S. and the Central America, which is famous for its beaches, mountains, landscapes and deserts. It is also famous for its food items that attract a large number of visitors from across the world. One of world’ Puerto Vallarta: A resort town on Mexico’ Cozumel: An undeveloped Mexican island in the Caribbean Sea, Cozumel happens to be a popular cruise ship port which is also known for scuba diving. Sneak into the Mayan culture, enjoy cruise rides, or snorkel in the crystal clear Mazatlan: The 20 km stretch of sandy beaches makes Mazatlan an alluring tourist destination in Mexico. Sit back
